pullrequest.title: changing from gettimeofday to clock_gettime in common::Time class.  Added nanosleep in World::Step, improved cpu load during pause.

content.raw:
If _tv represents a duration, wouldn't it be better to transform it into a sec (_tv.sec + 1e9 * _tv.nsec) and then multiply?
Also, Correct will fail if the nsec multiplication gives a result larger than 1 sec (1e9)

I can't can't think of a scenario when calling this method would make sense.
